summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Free Books feature and Content Library. All 13 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests passed - login, Library page navigation, Free Books category, category filters (Stories, Poetry, Grammar, Math, Science), search functionality, and Videos page with cached results all working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Free Books feature fully tested and working. Backend endpoints /api/content-library/free-books and /api/content-library/free-books/search return correct data with proper filtering. Frontend displays 19 books from Project Gutenberg with proper book cards showing title, author, category, Public Domain badge, grade levels, and download buttons (PDF, EPUB, Read Online). Category filters (Stories, Poetry, Grammar, Math, Science) work correctly. Search bar has proper 48px left padding - no text/icon overlap. Videos page shows cached results due to YouTube API quota exceeded (expected behavior).

features_tested.login_flow: PASS - Login with apitester@test.com works correctly
features_tested.library_page: PASS - /library route loads correctly with search bar and category filters
features_tested.free_books_category: PASS - Clicking 'Free Books' displays 19 books from Project Gutenberg
features_tested.book_cards: PASS - Cards show title, author, category, Public Domain badge, grade levels, PDF/EPUB/Read Online buttons
features_tested.search_bar: PASS - No text/icon overlap (48px padding-left), search works correctly
features_tested.free_books_api: PASS - /api/content-library/free-books returns books with proper structure
features_tested.videos_page: PASS - /discover loads with 25 cached CC BY videos (quota exceeded expected)
